title: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When I launch the Help view on March 26, 2002, in Windows 2000, the tab key does not perform any action.
EB: When I launch the Help view on March 26, 2002, in Windows 2000, pressing the tab key should navigate through the interactive elements within the Help view.
SR:
1. Open the Help view on March 26, 2002, in Windows 2000.
2. Attempt to navigate through the interactive elements in the Help view using the tab key.
